title: 100% Pure, Undiluted Herbal Scented Essential Oils
description: Reminiscent of fresh herbs used in the kitchen, traditional medicine, and taking a walk through a field of wildflowers, many of the most popular essential oils in aromatherapy are described as having an herbal scent. Green, fresh, clean, uplifting, and relaxing, discover the amazing benefits of the herbaceous oils.
